files:
- wrapper1: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_16_build.rar
- wrapper2: https://github.com/legluondunet/mlls-tools/raw/refs/heads/master/dgVoodoo2/dgVoodoo2_79_3.zip
- game_cd: https://archive.org/download/Scorched_Planet_Criterion_Software_1996/Scorched%20Planet%20%28Criterion%20Software%29%281996%29.ISO
game:
  exe: drive_c/splanet.bat
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanetcd
    file: game_cd
    format: iso
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanet
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanetcd/SPLANET
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanet
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanetcd/VOODOO
- execute:
    command: chmod -R +w "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanet";
- write_config:
    data:
      scorch:
        HighQualityVideo: 1
        name: $USER
        settings: 1 0 1 1 5 95 127 0 0 5 320
        video: c:\splanetcd\splanet\video
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanet/splanet.ini
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: wrapper1
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        cdvol0: 100
        coord0: 3
        exepath: C:\splanet\
        expert: 1
        fakecd0: c:\splanetcd
        fakecdlabel0: SPLANET
        flag0: 673185825
        flagg0: 1207963664
        flagh0: 22
        flagi0: 142622724
        flagj0: 4240
        flagk0: 65536
        flagl0: 192
        flagn0: 17825796
        flago0: 64
        flagp0: 8192
        icon0: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresw0: 800
        launchpath0: C:\splanet\spvoodoo.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 30
        maxres0: -1
        monitorid0: -1
        path0: C:\splanet\spvoodoo.exe
        posx0: 50
        posy0: 50
        renderer0: 3
        sizx0: 800
        sizy0: 600
        slowratio0: 2
        startfolder0: C:\splanet\spvoodoo.exe
        tflag0: -2147483647
        title0: Scorched Planet
      window:
        exepath: C:\splanet\
        expert: 1
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: wrapper2
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanet
    src: $CACHE/3Dfx/x86/Glide.dll
- write_file:
    content: 'c:

      cd \

      cd c:\dxwnd

      start dxwnd.exe

      cd "c:\splanet"

      start /w SPVOODOO.EXE

      taskkill /F /IM dxwnd.exe

      '
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanet.bat
